title: About
text: I’m just a Dad who likes data and cross country, and I’m happy my kids are running. This is a way that I can engage with them about this sport that I love. All results for this site have been scraped from MileSplit.com. I will be pointing back to the race sites to properly credit MileSplit and the schools who are using that resource to host their meet information.

title: Post With Code
text: This is a post with executable code.

title: Welcome To My Blog
text:
This is the first post in a Quarto blog. Welcome!

Since this post doesn’t specify an explicit image, the first image in the post will be used in the listing page of posts.

title: Light Up The Night
text:
All Big Carolina 6A/7A teams (excluding New Bern) competed at the Hwy 24 Light up the night invitational. The JH Rose boys harriers ran in the JV Race only. The results for the Varsity races are below.

So the dot representing the 2nd and 3rd place runner have the same horizontal separation as the horizontal separation between the 22nd and 23rd runners regardless of the time between them.

title: Fightertown Invitational
text:
The course was flat and fast, and the weather was great, clear and warm, but not too hot. Jacksonville and White Oak were the only teams from our league that we saw here.
